casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

July 23, 2010

[Cite as 07123/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-3431.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-1205. State v. Masters.

Gallia App. No. 09CA15, 2010-Ohio-3365. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Gallia County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of execution of sentence,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.

Brown, C.J., and Pfeifer, J., dissent.
